root.name: iBomber Defense Pacific
root.description: OverviewiBomber Defense Pacific is a tower defense game developed by Cobra Mobile and published by Cobra Mobile (PC version) and Chillingo (iOS version) for the PC and iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad platforms.The battlefield has relocated to the Pacific Rim where, like the previous iBomber installments, the objective is to defeat the enemy using a variety of air and ground weaponry. The campaign proceeds through levels of increasing difficulty with additional weapons becoming unlocked and available for purchase for use in-game. On iOS, "Unlimited Rocket Bombs" are available as an in-app purchase.
